monuments.name: At the city centre, come see the citys monuments. Cost is Free.

city tour.name: Take a tour around the city on a open top bus. Cost is £10

art gallery.name: See modern or classical art at the gallery. Cost is Free.

park.name: Explore nature and have a day out at the park. Cost is Free

countryside.name: See the hills and wildlife outside the city. Cost is Free

zoo.name: See a large selection of wild animals at the Zoo. Cost is £30

restaurant.name: Try the local cuisine or ones from around the world. Cost is from 10 to 40 pounds

football game.name: Come and see live football games and be entertained by the world's biggest sport. Cost is £60

theatre.name: Live plays on display from Grease to Mama Mia. Cost is £15

concert.name: Enjoy Live music from artists that you enjoy. Cost is £50

club.name: Explore the nightlife and enjoy a night out with your friends. Cost is £7

movies.name: Come and see the latest movies. Cost is £8
